meanings.definition: A very large number, typically one with nine zeros after it.
meanings.sent1: The company produced billions of products last year.
meanings.sent2: The population of the world is in the billions.
meanings.sent3: I have billions of ideas for our school project!
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky seemed like billions of diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation made the concept clear as billions in my mind.

meanings.definition: A very large amount of money.
meanings.sent1: The billionaire donated billions to charity.
meanings.sent2: Winning the lottery could make you a billionaire with billions in your bank account.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had billions to buy all the toys in the store!
meanings.sent4: The cost of the new building project was estimated in the billions.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with gold coins, worth billions in total.
